facts.fact: Dave Schwantes can't be killed by conventional means.
Dave Schwantes is the wave of the future.
Dave Schwantes will probably outlive you.
Pound for pound, Dave Schwantes is the world's most awesome mammal.
Dave Schwantes would like to eat a cloud, just once.
Dave Schwantes won't eat reptiles out of principle.
Millions of years ago, Dave Schwantes was the most feared marine hunter in the Pacific Ocean.
Dave Schwantes puts way too much cheese on things.
Dave Schwantes could eat a whole sandwich in one bite if he really tried.
